title: MAGIX Music Maker 2023 Premium - Make the music you love I audio software I music program I Windows 10 / 11 I 1 PC licence
description: The new MUSIC MAKER 2023 PREMIUM is more powerful, more versatile and even more fun than before! Make your own songs and beats quickly – no experience required. No other music production software gets you amazing results this quickly. Exciting features: The new Beatbox Pro 2 comes with authentic drum sounds and grooves. Make your beats even fatter – with intricate loops and 32 dynamic steps. Achieve pristine sound in every mix with modernEQ and enhance your songs with 11 new effects from the wizardFX Suite in just a few clicks. Want to arrange music even faster? The improved Song Maker AI provides a boost to your creativity with the help of artificial intelligence. Produce music like a pro in no time!
